[File: aptos-core/types/src/on_chain_config/consensus_config.rs] [Function: disable_rand_check()] [Randomness check race] Can disable_rand_check() race with config reads during block proposal, causing inconsistent randomness generation decisions? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/on_chain_config/consensus_config.rs] [All mutation functions] [No synchronization] Do config mutation methods (enable_validator_txns, disable_validator_txns, disable_rand_check) lack synchronization primitives, allowing data races if called concurrently? (High)
